name: Marabou
run: vehicle compile -s simple-pruneDecls.vcl -t Marabou -o simple-pruneDecls.inputquery --network g:NO_FILE -e p2

name: Agda
run: vehicle compile -s simple-pruneDecls.vcl -t Agda -o simple-pruneDecls.agda --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE -e p2

name: LossFunction
run: vehicle compile -s simple-pruneDecls.vcl -t LossFunction -o simple-pruneDecls.loss.json --network f:NO_FILE --network g:NO_FILE
